CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Retention_Call_Completed__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( SDBA_Balance_Issue_Resolved__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Plan_Liquidation_Complete_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Complete__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Valuation_Edit_Complete_Date__c ) ,0,1)
CustomField.label: Transfer Status Calc
